reviews.review_msg: I agree with some of these comments for the most part - El is a pretty disorganized prof (probably the most disorganized prof I will ever meet), and yes, it got frustrating at times. But honestly, she's not as bad as most of these comments say. She's caring, willing to listen, and teaches some interesting (and different!) content.

Dr. Chenier is an amazing prof. She expects a lot but in a good way. She makes you realize your full potential and the skills she provides you with are invaluable. She is enthusiastic and always willing to help and talk to you.
